commit message:
Add 'Android is a trademark of Google Inc.' at the bottom of README files.

As suggested by
http://developer.android.com/legal.html
Update the Google Play store description.

README_translators: Update instructions for translating the website/decision-tree.

Which we can then use.

Temporarily remove translations.

Because the only finished app translation (German) doesn't have
a finished decision-tree (website) translation,
and the only finished decision-tree (website) translations
don't have finished app translations.

Hopefully more app translations will be ready soon. Then I can
revert this commit.
